article: arab-americans , who make up a significant minority in three closely contested states , are sending a flurry of angry letters and e-mails complaining that john edwards did not mention palestinians in his answer to a question about the middle east in the vice presidential debate tuesday .
abstract: edwards comments on mideast draw fire
